2017260.name: A Very Corporate Escape Room
2017260.description:
Your manager doesn't want you to work from home. How far will he go to keep you in the office forever?

You will crack codes. You will piece puzzles together. And as you do so, you will solve the greatest riddle of all; just what does your manager get up to when he locks himself in his office?

A Very Corporate Escape Room will test your wits with dozens of conundrums, and test your sanity as you delve further into a corporate nightmare. Make your way through the whole office, from break room to bathroom, as you look for a means of escape. As you unlock more rooms, you may end up finding more than you bargained for.

Features


  • A range of puzzle types to test your reasoning skills
  • A dark office mystery that unravels as you unlock new locations
  • 100% accurate satire of office life
  • 1 day of sick leave per annum with doctor's note
